div.style: float:left; position:relative; border-left: 2px solid black; border-right: 2px solid black; border-bottom: 2px solid black; margin-left: 14px;

div.p: We are only responsible for any deficiency in your Finish Fabric regarding Fresh & B.C.P percentage & also any other claim/problem untill the fabric laying in our premisis. Please take over your BCP meters wihtin maximum 1 month from the bill date. After that we are not responsible of your BCP meters.
